# Overview {-}

```{r img-00-masks, fig.align='center', out.width="50%", echo=F}
knitr::include_graphics("imgs/00-masks.png")
```

This digital book contains resources and learning materials compiled for Kevin Labar's [Laboratory](http://www.labarlab.com/) of Emotion and Cognition. Content is organized in the following chapters:

* Chapter \@ref(getting-started), Getting Started
* Chapter \@ref(access-server), Accessing Servers
* Chapter \@ref(psychophys), Psychophysics
* Chapter \@ref(psychtoolbox), Psychtoolbox
* Chapter \@ref(fmri), Functional MRI
* Chapter \@ref(programming), Programming
* Chapter \@ref(databases), Databases

## Planned content additions {-}

- Git tutorial
- Programming in python, R, shell, Matlab
- Databases
- NeuroImaging and the Duke Compute Cluster
- FMRI processing and analyses guide
